titles.title: Increase in Numerical Limitation for Asylees Adjustment Act of 2003
To increase the numerical limitation on the number of asylees whose status may be adjusted to that of an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

bill.summary: 1/7/2003--Introduced. Increase in Numerical Limitation for Asylees Adjustment Act of 2003 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to increase the annual limitation on the number of asylees who may adjust to permanent legal resident status.
